Name: Hollywood Hero
About the game: 'Hollywood Hero' game allows you to try out a Hollywood actor role. Well-aimed shots can destroy enemies and shoot traps, gems will increase your box office receipts, and Oscars will give you a pass to the next level. Be careful, sometimes there can be a deadly danger behind movie decorations! Overcome all the difficulties on the way to become a Hollywood hero and a superstar! Game Features: - Funny setting - Old school gameplay - Awesome pixel art graphics - Steam Achievements support - Great game soundtrack
